description: This file provides functions to extract and format version information from a provided 'info' dictionary. It includes utility functions GetVersion and GetVersionString to handle different formats of version data.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts version as a list of [major, minor, patch] integers from the input info dictionary, processing different input formats and providing default values if necessary.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns a dot-separated string representing the version, by calling GetVersion and joining its output.
